comments:
Convert :class:`~gensim.models.wrappers.ldavowpalwabbit.LdaVowpalWabbit` to :class:`~gensim.models.ldamodel.LdaModel`.

This works by simply copying the training model weights (alpha, beta...) from a trained vwmodel into the gensim model.

Parameters ---------- vw_model : :class:`~gensim.models.wrappers.ldavowpalwabbit.LdaVowpalWabbit` Trained Vowpal Wabbit model. iterations : int Number of iterations to be used for inference of the new :class:`~gensim.models.ldamodel.LdaModel`.
##### Returns
* ****: class
